content: Is there special syntax for unwrapping singleton types without an explicit match statement? I can't find anything in the docs but just wanted to check in case it's just not documented.

If you mean single-constructor types, then you can use let with a pattern:

let (x, y) := getThePair
doStuff x y
that is what i was looking for, and i do actually remember seeing that before oops; thank you!
Bhakti Shah has marked this topic as resolved.
